text:
Hi folks,
I need some advice on how to develop a quite not-as-usual survey and form.
We´re trying to do an online survey (you answer some questions splitted in differente pages, and get your results in the last one, basically like a Typeform, but we´d love to do it in HubSpot CMS).
What we need to figure out is the right way to do this without any third-party app (what´s the best kind of CMS module for this) and get the results automated into a follow-up email that prospects can receive after finishing the test.
We´re trying to develop it using css and javascript, basically, but I got the feeling that there´s some another and easy way.
Any advice would be highly appreciated.
Thanks in advance
